snippet: A jeweler in Nice is being praised as a hero and criticized as a vigilante after prosecutors said he fatally shot in the back a teenager who had robbed him.
abstract: Jeweler in Nice, France, is being praised as a hero and criticized as a vigilante after prosecutors say he fatally shot in the back a teenager who had robbed him; case has set off a national debate in France about how to define self-defense.
lead_paragraph: A jeweler in Nice is being praised as a hero and criticized as a vigilante after prosecutors said he fatally shot in the back a teenager who had robbed him.

headline.main: France Debates Self-Defense as Robbery Victim Faces Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: France Debates Self-Defense as Robbery Victim Faces Murder Charge
